String.string:
Click [H] to open
Initiative Requests.
Quests recommended for your level are marked with a 'thumbs' up' icon. Complete hunts, dungeons, and battlegrounds to earn Vanguard badges.

Use these buttons to teleport to quest checkpoints or
hunting areas, enter a dungeon queue, or find a group
for a battleground.

You may claim rewards for
completing
Guardian Missions.
Level 60? Try this story quest!
Click to learn a new skill.
Your team is attacking the enemy gate.
The enemies are attacking the gate.
Your team is attacking the enemy pyre.
The enemies are attacking the pyre.
Your team is attacking the enemy anchorstone.
The enemies are attacking your anchorstone.
<font color='#ff00ff'>Passive 1</font>
<font color='#0f0ff0'>Passive 2</font>
Select and obtain EP.
Click + button to obtain next Stage.
EP for upgrading EP Stage.
Click - button to reset EP Stage.
Click Confirm to save the changes.
EP will be refunded if you cancel the changes.

Reward Tier
Different perks are available
as you increase in tiers.

Reward Points
Gained through leveling, TERA Shop purchases, and completing Vanguard Requests.

Exclusive Functions
Special content is unlocked as your reward tier increases.

TERA Rewards Perks
Benefits at each reward tier.

Compare Perks
Click arrows to compare perks at different reward tiers.

Store Shelves
Achieve higher reward tiers to gain access to shelves with better items.

Reward Credits
Earn reward credits through TERA Shop purchases, exclusive dungeon, and daily awards.
Reward credits are shared across your account.

Refresh Items
Items on the shelves refresh at specific intervals,
or you can spend reward credits to refresh them immediately.
<font size='15'>1. Activate </font><font size='15'><font color='#FFFF00'>Guardian mode</font></font><font size='15'>.</font>
<font size='15'>2. Click the </font><font size='15'><font color='#FFFF00'>Track button</font></font><font size='15'> to highlight Guardian Legion missions.</font>
<font size='15'>3. Select a </font><font size='15'><font color='#FFFF00'>Guardian Legion mission</font></font><font size='15'> to join.</font>
You now have access to <font size='15'></font><font size='15'><font color='#FFFF00'>Skill Advancement</font></font><font size='15'></font>.

Dismantle items with the Dismantle icon below your inventory
to collect various materials.
<font size='18'>Select the item to enchant from your inventory and use <font color='#FFFF00'>Relic Fragments</font> to enchant.</font>

Choose a glyph and use glyph points
to activate the glyph.

You can reset dungeons from the Instances tab
after clearing a dungeon.
<font size='16'><font color='#FFFF00'>Add a row of slots</font> to your Pocket Tab.</font>
<font size='16'>Adjust your <font color='#FFFF00'>loot priority settings</font>.</font>
<font size='16'><font color='#FFFF00'>Add a new</font> tab.</font>
<font size='16'><font color='#FFFF00'>Show/Hide</font> your Pocket Tab.</font>

Pocket Tab Guide

For your pleasant storage!

A brand new Pocket Tab!

Featuring a D.I.Y [loot priority] setting!
<font size='16'>You can obtain a new skill at every <font color='#FFFF00'>even level</font> until level 60.</font>
